summary: Test module that validates the behavior of Prefect's serializer classes, including base, compressed, JSON, and pickle serializers, ensuring they can be instantiated, handle various inputs, maintain round‑trip data integrity, support custom encoders/decoders, and work with different compression and pickle back‑ends.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable serialization and deserialization within the Prefect platform by automatically testing core serializer functionality, compatibility with optional libraries, and proper error handling, thereby preventing data corruption and integration issues.
